input_args.instruction:
'Instructions: 
Use the Context provided as follows:
1. Options:
	The correct answer is always included in given list. 
	Use the options to filter out irrelevant details provided in the context.

2. Genes and Variants:
	Only focus on the information about the genes and variants.
	Please ignore the other information.
Context: 
Disease oropharynx cancer associates Gene HLA-DQB1. Disease oropharynx cancer associates Gene ADH1B.. Variant rs9266329 associates Disease oropharynx cancer. Variant rs189602139 associates Disease oropharynx cancer. Variant rs2523679 associates Disease oropharynx cancer. Disease oral cavity cancer associates Gene HLA-DQB1. Disease oral cavity cancer associates Gene GPN1.. Disease oral cavity cancer associates Gene ADH1B. Variant rs121909224 associates Disease oral cavity cancer. Variant rs8181047 associates Disease oral cavity cancer. Variant rs1049055 associates Disease oral cavity cancer. Variant rs121913281 associates Disease oral cavity cancer. Variant rs121913277 associates Disease oral cavity cancer. 
Question: 
Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with oropharynx cancer and oral cavity cancer. Given list is: MYBPC3,  KIF1B,  DGKK, HLA-DQB1,  HLA-B'
